channel.title: Careers on Dragonfly
channel.description: Recent content in Careers on Dragonfly

item.title: Developer Advocate
item.description: At Dragonfly, we aspire to be the fastest, easiest, and most scalable in-memory datastore. The most popular solutions used by engineers today were created nearly 15+ years ago: weâ€™re here to bring in-memory datastores to the modern cloud.

item.title: Core C++ engineer
item.description: Work with best-in-class engineers around the globe to develop the open technology behind the state-of-the-art in-memory store using C++ 17. Contribute to a public project, maintain and participate in the community around it.

item.title: DevOps engineer
item.description: Build the tools and processes so any developer will be able to install, test, integrate, deploy, monitor and scale dragonfly with ease. Manage Dragonfly’s cloud workloads from design to deployment and maintenance.
